content: the ceramic art headband features two mirrored cables in the middle flanked by two small cables on a reverse stockinette background the headband is knit flat the pattern is a 12-row repeat the first and last 2 stitches form an i-cord edging that makes the edges look neat and prevents them from curling the cast-on and bind-off edges are seamed together forming a decorative twist in the middle the seam is hidden by the twist and is not visible
